Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 4 lines of text on recto and 4 lines on verso containing Psalms 100.6-8.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (91, pl.29a, b)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395071) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395071)
